H0.text: what land mass was north america a part of about 300 million years ago. Laurasia

H1.text: what land mass was north america a part of about 300 million years ago. Gondwana

H2.text: what land mass was north america a part of about 300 million years ago. Laurentia

H3.text: what land mass was north america a part of about 300 million years ago. Pangaea

A4.text: Laurasia () was the more northern of two large landmasses that formed part of the Pangaea supercontinent from around 335 to 175 million years ago (Mya), the other being Gondwana.
